content.text:
[@jacob](@Vz6v3xKpzViiTM/GAe+hKkACZSqrErQQZgv4iqQxEn8=.ed25519) 

I don't think they've changed, but I don't use them because [they don't treat Linux like the other operating systems](https://protonmail.com/bridge/install) and that's a big bummer for me. I like the idea of crypto-cloud shenanigans but at the end of the day I don't think it matters. I use FastMail, but there are plenty of other options.
